items.description: Analyze repository structure and artifact inventory
items.acceptance_criteria: Produce a module inventory listing every file and directory in repo root with one-sentence purpose and dependency notes
items.notes: Completed full root inventory (11/11 entries) with one-sentence purpose and dependency notes in docs/module_inventory.md and results/item_001_module_inventory.json; verified zero missing entries.

items.description: Define formal 5D chess problem statement
items.acceptance_criteria: Document state, action, transition, reward, and terminal conditions with at least 3 worked examples of legal and illegal moves
items.notes: Formalized 5D chess MDP (state/action/transition/reward/terminal) in docs/problem_statement_5d_chess.md with 6 worked legal/illegal examples (3 legal, 3 illegal) captured in results/item_002_problem_statement.json.

items.description: Survey AlphaGo/AlphaZero-style search-learning paradigms
items.acceptance_criteria: Summarize at least 10 primary references and extract design choices for policy/value targets, MCTS variants, and self-play regimes
items.notes: Surveyed 12 primary AlphaGo/AlphaZero/MuZero-family references and extracted design choices for policy/value targets, MCTS variants, and self-play regimes in docs/literature_alphago_az_survey.md and results/item_003_literature_survey.json.

items.description: Survey state-of-the-art methods for large branching board games
items.acceptance_criteria: Create comparison table of at least 6 methods with columns for branching-factor strategy, sample efficiency, compute cost, and known limitations
items.notes: Created comparison table of 7 large-branching methods with required columns (branching-factor strategy, sample efficiency, compute cost, limitations) in docs/large_branching_methods_comparison.md and results/item_004_large_branching_comparison.json.

items.description: Establish research hypotheses and success criteria
items.acceptance_criteria: Define at least 4 falsifiable hypotheses and numeric success targets for Elo gain, win rate, training cost, and inference latency
items.notes: Defined 5 falsifiable hypotheses and numeric success targets for Elo gain, win rate, training cost, and inference latency in docs/research_hypotheses_success_criteria.md and results/item_005_hypotheses.json.

items.description: Specify baseline software architecture and module contracts
items.acceptance_criteria: Deliver interface spec for game engine, encoder, policy-value model, MCTS, self-play worker, and evaluator with I/O schemas and failure modes
items.notes: Delivered architecture and contract spec for engine, encoder, policy-value model, MCTS, self-play worker, and evaluator with I/O schemas and failure modes in docs/architecture_module_contracts.md, src/alphago5d/contracts.py, and results/item_006_architecture_contracts.json.

items.description: Define canonical board-state encoding for 5D chess
items.acceptance_criteria: Provide tensor schema with dimensions, channel semantics, normalization rules, and round-trip consistency tests over 100 sampled states
items.notes: Implemented canonical board-state encoder/decoder schema in src/alphago5d/encoding.py with documented dimensions/channel semantics/normalization in docs/encoding_schema.md; executed deterministic 100-state round-trip validation (seed 42), 100/100 pass in results/item_007_encoding_roundtrip.json.

items.description: Implement deterministic baseline move generator and rule validator plan
items.acceptance_criteria: List baseline rule-check components and acceptance test suite covering at least 95% of enumerated rule classes
items.notes: Implemented deterministic baseline move generator (src/alphago5d/engine.py) and documented rule-check component plan with acceptance test coverage 19/20 classes (95.0%) in docs/rule_validator_plan.md and results/item_008_rule_validator_plan.json; determinism check passed.

items.description: Define baseline agents for benchmarking
items.acceptance_criteria: Specify at least three baselines (random, heuristic, shallow search) and evaluation protocol over 500 games per matchup
items.notes: Defined three baselines (random, heuristic, shallow search) and executed 500-game evaluation per matchup (3 matchups total) with fixed seed 42; protocol and results documented in docs/baseline_agents_protocol.md and results/item_009_baseline_agents_benchmark.json.

items.description: Define metrics and instrumentation framework
items.acceptance_criteria: Finalize metric definitions for Elo, win rate, node expansions/sec, training throughput, wall-clock cost, and memory footprint with logging schema
items.notes: Finalized metrics and instrumentation framework with Elo, win rate, node expansions/sec, training throughput, wall-clock cost, and memory footprint plus JSONL logging schema in docs/metrics_instrumentation_framework.md, src/alphago5d/metrics.py, and results/item_010_metrics_framework.json.

items.description: Design policy-value network family for 5D chess topology
items.acceptance_criteria: Propose at least 3 model variants with parameter counts, receptive-field rationale, and projected FLOPs per inference
items.notes: Proposed 3 policy-value network variants with parameter counts, receptive-field rationale, and projected FLOPs in docs/network_family_design.md and results/item_011_network_family.json.

items.description: Design MCTS enhancements for extreme branching
items.acceptance_criteria: Specify selection/expansion/backprop equations and at least 3 enhancements (e.g., progressive widening, virtual loss, action pruning) with expected impact
items.notes: Specified MCTS selection/expansion/backprop equations and 4 enhancements (progressive widening, virtual loss, legality pruning, transposition table) with expected impact in docs/mcts_enhancements_design.md and results/item_012_mcts_enhancements.json.

items.description: Design action-space factorization and legality masking strategy
items.acceptance_criteria: Define factorized move representation and masking pipeline that guarantees zero probability mass on illegal moves in validation checks
items.notes: Defined factorized move representation and legality masking pipeline in docs/action_factorization_masking.md and src/alphago5d/masking.py; validation check confirms zero probability mass on illegal actions (results/item_013_action_masking_validation.json).

items.description: Design self-play data generation pipeline
items.acceptance_criteria: Specify worker topology, replay buffer policy, target generation, and data freshness constraints with throughput target in games/hour

items.description: Design training curriculum and stabilization mechanisms
items.acceptance_criteria: Define staged curriculum, temperature schedule, resignation logic, and optimization hyperparameter ranges with promotion criteria between stages

items.description: Design compute-efficiency strategy
items.acceptance_criteria: Plan mixed precision, batching, caching, and parallelization tactics with target reductions of at least 30% in training cost per Elo point

items.description: Define experimental matrix and run registry
items.acceptance_criteria: Create experiment matrix covering at least 12 runs across architecture, search, and curriculum factors with immutable run IDs

items.description: Run controlled ablations for major components
items.acceptance_criteria: Execute ablations removing each major component independently and report Elo delta with 95% confidence intervals

items.description: Benchmark against baselines and prior best internal model
items.acceptance_criteria: Complete round-robin of at least 1000 games per opponent and achieve predefined superiority threshold in win rate or Elo

items.description: Evaluate robustness and generalization
items.acceptance_criteria: Test on at least 5 unseen opening distributions and 3 time-control settings with performance degradation capped by predefined threshold

items.description: Evaluate efficiency and scaling behavior
items.acceptance_criteria: Produce scaling curves for model size and simulation budget vs Elo, plus latency and memory at 3 hardware tiers

items.description: Validate reproducibility of key claims
items.acceptance_criteria: Re-run top 3 configurations with new seeds and confirm key metrics remain within predeclared tolerance bands

items.description: Perform failure-mode and error taxonomy analysis
items.acceptance_criteria: Classify at least 200 loss cases into a labeled taxonomy and quantify frequency and Elo impact per category

items.description: Synthesize results into decision-ready research report
items.acceptance_criteria: Deliver report with methods, metrics, ablations, limitations, and go/no-go recommendation supported by quantitative evidence

items.description: Produce reproducibility and handoff package
items.acceptance_criteria: Publish manifest of configs, seeds, datasets, model checkpoints, and command recipes that recreates headline results end-to-end
